*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Nashville */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="11-05-1826">5th Novr 1826*/date_mentioned**/p*. *p**person_mentioned*Colo. Austin*/person_mentioned*,*/p* *p*Dear Sir*/p* *p*This will be handed to you by my young Friend *person_mentioned*Colo. Benjn F. Foster*/person_mentioned* who goes out to *location_mentioned**person_mentioned*Leftwich*/person_mentioned*'s Grant*/location_mentioned* as the agent for the *person_mentioned*Company*/person_mentioned*. *person_mentioned*Colo Foster*/person_mentioned* is a young man of sterling entegrity and worth; any attentions shown him will not be misplaced. He is young and unacquainted with business, and will feel himself under singular obligations to you for any information you may have it in your power to afford him which will facilitate his undertaking. He will be accompanied by*person_mentioned* W. E. Winn*/person_mentioned* and three or four other young *person_mentioned*men*/person_mentioned* of worth—If all alarm relative to the *person_mentioned*Indians */person_mentioned*could be entirely quieted, the *location_mentioned*Brassos */location_mentioned*would populate very rapidly. It is therefore of the utmost importance to the present *person_mentioned*settlers */person_mentioned*in that *location_mentioned*Country */location_mentioned*to keep in perfect friendship with them if possible I should be glad to hear from yourself the real state of things at present and in prospect with the different neighboring *person_mentioned*Tribes*/person_mentioned*. I fear it is more than probable that my state of health will drive me from this *location_mentioned*Country*/location_mentioned*, and if the prospects of rapid settlement on the *location_mentioned*Brassos */location_mentioned*is unfavorable I should move to *location_mentioned*opalousas */location_mentioned*in *location_mentioned*Louisiana */location_mentioned*I fear I shall not have good health in this *location_mentioned*Country*/location_mentioned*, and have but little doubt that in a part judiciously chosen in the *location_mentioned*Brassos */location_mentioned*that I should be healthy, please write me shortly the present state of your *location_mentioned*settlements*/location_mentioned*, as to health increase etc etc*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Felix Robertson*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
